name: Planet Deth
description:
It's a game about death, and planets. and shields. But mostly death. Left-click to place buildings. Click and drag from the center building on the planet to launch satellites. Survive 5 rounds to win.

Made during the 48 hour Global Game Jam 2018 in Casper, Wyoming.

https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/planet-deth

https://globalgamejam.org/2018/jam-sites/wyoming-game-devs

By:

Paul Blinkinsop

Steven Butler

Bradley Erickson

Spencer Hedeen
